title: Disabled people in Sweden 2018 , by disability type
summary: This chart shows the Disabled people Sweden in Mental_retardation_autism_or_pervasive_developmental_disorders 2018 compared with that in Other_lasting_physical_or_mental_disabilities_that_are_clearly_not_due_to_normal_aging and the Significant_and_permanent_intellectual_disability_after_brain_damage_in_adult_age_caused_by_external_violence_or_physical_illness .
In Mental_retardation_autism_or_pervasive_developmental_disorders there was a 65191 % difference in the salaries of men and women .

data.Disability Type: Mental retardation autism or pervasive developmental disorders
Other lasting physical or mental disabilities that are clearly not due to normal aging
Significant and permanent intellectual disability after brain damage in adult age caused by external violence or physical illness

gold: This statistic shows the number of disabled people in Sweden in 2018 , by type of disability accordingly to the Swedish LSS law . That year , there were over 65 thousand people with intellectual disabilities like e.g . autism in Sweden .
